EmailTemplate.name: DPS - DuPont™ Nomex® Where to Buy Internationally and Product Support
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont™ Nomex® Where to Buy Internationally and Product Support
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in DuPont™ Nomex®.
Please visit out DuPont website which provides additional information on where to buy Nomex® internationally. (To view the web address, cut and paste the web address below into your browser.)
http://www2.dupont.com/Nomex/en_US/sales_support/index.html
DuPont Protection Solutions
